title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Launch web applications in seconds with Amazon ECS [Butterfly] (CNS379)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon ECS 在几秒钟内启动 Web 应用程序 [Butterfly] (CNS379)
abstract: What if you could deploy a production-ready containerized application with just one command? Amazon ECS Express Mode makes this possible. In this lightning talk, watch a live demonstration of deploying a containerized application that's instantly production-ready with automatic URL generation, scaling, and AWS best practices built-in. Learn how you can start simple and still access the full power of ECS as your application needs grow. See how we're revolutionizing container deployment on AWS, turning hours of configuration into seconds of execution.
abstract_cn: 如果您只需一个命令就能部署生产就绪的容器化应用程序，会怎样？Amazon ECS Express 模式让这成为可能。在这个简短演讲中，观看容器化应用程序的实时部署演示，该应用程序即时可用于生产环境，内置自动 URL 生成、扩展和 AWS 最佳实践。了解如何从简单开始，同时在应用程序需求增长时仍能访问 ECS 的全部功能。看看我们如何革新 AWS 上的容器部署，将数小时的配置转变为数秒的执行。
